name: Olympic Torch Relay - Pass It ON!
description:
#HENsports Event in honor of the 2021 Summer Olympic Games.  This year they did not have the traditional Olympic torch relay all over the world.  Due to COVID the torch relay was confined to just Japan.  So, I am a few friends, each made an extra special NFT for a virtual torch relay.  

Mine represents the moment the torch is passed from one runner to the next.  To quote the song "Pass It On' by Kurt Kaiser  "It only takes a spark to get a fire going and then all those around can warm up in it's glowing".  I hope #HENsports sets Hic Et Nunc ABLAZE and brings our community to a whole new level!
